content:
TITLE: Using Cypress Testing Library Query Commands DESCRIPTION: Examples of using Testing Library query commands in Cypress tests. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` cy.findAllByText('Button Text').should('exist') cy.findAllByText('Non-existing Button Text').should('not.exist') cy.findAllByLabelText('Label text', {timeout: 7000}).should('exist') cy.findAllByText('Jackie Chan').click() // findAllByText _inside_ a form element cy.get('form').findAllByText('Button Text').should('exist') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Cypress Testing Library Commands DESCRIPTION: JavaScript import statement to add Testing Library commands to Cypress. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import '@testing-library/cypress/add-commands' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring DOM Testing Library DESCRIPTION: Example of using the custom command to configure DOM Testing Library settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` cy.configureCypressTestingLibrary(config) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Custom Test ID Attribute DESCRIPTION: Example of configuring a custom test ID attribute for DOM queries. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import {configure} from '@testing-library/cypress' configure({testIdAttribute: 'data-test-id'}) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Cypress Testing Library via NPM DESCRIPTION: Command to install the library as a dev dependency using npm package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install --save-dev @testing-library/cypress ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring TypeScript Types for Cypress Testing Library DESCRIPTION: TypeScript configuration to add type definitions for Cypress and Testing Library. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "compilerOptions": { "types": ["cypress", "@testing-library/cypress"] } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring JavaScript Intellisense in VS Code DESCRIPTION: VS Code JavaScript configuration for code completion support. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "include": ["node_modules/cypress", "./cypress/**/*.js"] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting up Git Remote for Upstream Repository in Cypress Testing Library DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to set up your local Git repository to track the original upstream repository. It adds the upstream remote, fetches its data, and configures your local main branch to track the upstream main branch. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git remote add upstream https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library.git git fetch upstream git branch --set-upstream-to=upstream/main main ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Git Hooks for Cypress Testing Library DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the content to add to an .opt-in file to enable the pre-commit git hook. This hook runs automatically before commits to ensure code quality. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pre-commit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Commit Message Template for Major Manual Release in Cypress Testing Library DESCRIPTION: Template for the commit message to trigger a major version release manually when automated releases have issues. Includes placeholders for reference information and breaking changes that must be documented. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/other/manual-releases.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` fix(release): manually release a major version There was an issue with a major release, so this manual-releases.md change is to release a new major version. Reference: # BREAKING CHANGE: ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Commit Message Template for Minor Manual Release in Cypress Testing Library DESCRIPTION: Template for the commit message to trigger a minor version release manually when automated releases have issues. Includes a placeholder for reference information. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/other/manual-releases.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` feat(release): manually release a minor version There was an issue with a minor release, so this manual-releases.md change is to release a new minor version. Reference: # ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Commit Message Template for Patch Manual Release in Cypress Testing Library DESCRIPTION: Template for the commit message to trigger a patch version release manually when automated releases have issues. Includes a placeholder for reference information. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/other/manual-releases.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` fix(release): manually release a patch version There was an issue with a patch release, so this manual-releases.md change is to release a new patch version. Reference: # ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Contributors Table DESCRIPTION: A responsive HTML table displaying contributor information including avatars, names, and contribution types. Each contributor cell includes their GitHub avatar, profile link, name, and contribution emoji indicators. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```

Kent C. Dodds
üíª üìñ üöá ‚ö†Ô∏è
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Contributors Table in HTML DESCRIPTION: HTML table markup showing project contributors with their avatars, usernames, and contribution types using GitHub-style formatting. SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/cypress-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```
Franck Abgrall
üëÄ ```
